channel.title: Edit monster tele?[HOW]
channel.description:
ok i have a teleport in my magic book called '' monster tele '' if i click the button i go to another section where i can choose differnt places:
dagg lair
rock crabs
island
and cave
my question is How i edit the as example Dagglair so i can give it other names and teleport it to somewhere else why:becouse i made a nice training area for expiernced players so can someone help me TY of u do :rolleyes: greetz dvdnext

item.title: Edit monster tele?[HOW]
item.dc:creator: @dvdnext dvdnext
item.description:
@dvdnext wrote:

[quote=“durfx, post:2, topic:294519”]look around in your clickingMost.java
and mess around with searching your coords and what it says u’ll figure it out =][/quote]
ok i found it but how can i edit the name u know? maby?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 07:47:43 am[/size][hr][quote=“dirtynife, post:3, topic:294519”]1) Find you cords of daggs teleport by typing ::mypos.
2) Go to clickingmost.java and search for the cords you got. Just type the cords of the x:.
3) Change those cords and find your training’s area cords.
4) Replace 'em.
5) Go to texthandler.java and search for “dagg lair” and replace it with the name of your training area.
6) Compile and your done.

Have fun! :D[/quote]
ow thank yea

Read full topic

item.title: Edit monster tele?[HOW]
item.dc:creator: @dirtynife dirtynife
item.description:
@dirtynife wrote:

  1. Find you cords of daggs teleport by typing ::mypos.
  2. Go to clickingmost.java and search for the cords you got. Just type the cords of the x:.
  3. Change those cords and find your training’s area cords.
  4. Replace 'em.
  5. Go to texthandler.java and search for “dagg lair” and replace it with the name of your training area.
  6. Compile and your done.

Have fun!

Read full topic
